name: unWorded
description: unWorded is an innovative Narrative Puzzle Game where everything is built from letters. Use your imagination to create objects by assembling letters together and discover the story of a writer hospitalized after a serious accident...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible, Shader 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c
